items.text:
You stay far enough away not to alert the being and decide to follow
it as it leaves the reclaimer and disappears into the underbrush. As
you follow, you notice strange plants along the trail. The tiny, twisting
vines don’t appear to be native to the Valley, but look similar to plants
you heard of in the Verdessa. Perhaps that’s where this being is from?
But in any case, perhaps you can follow the trail left by these vines.

mission.
Return the Mysterious Verdessian to the General set.
